body_html:
We do not have official support for centOS, but here is a user who was able to successfully build TF on RHEL, which is very close:
#7118

Your particular problem was seen in that thread and resolved.

Also feel free to reach out to stackoverflow for issues on centOS.
body_text:
We do not have official support for centOS, but here is a user who was able to successfully build TF on RHEL, which is very close:
#7118
Your particular problem was seen in that thread and resolved.
Also feel free to reach out to stackoverflow for issues on centOS.
body:
We do not have official support for centOS, but here is a user who was able to successfully build TF on RHEL, which is very close:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7118

Your particular problem was seen in that thread and resolved.

Also feel free to reach out to stackoverflow for issues on centOS.
